title: John Heitinga - Wikipedia
snippet: On 17 July 2024, Heitinga was appointed as the new assistant coach at Liverpool. He took charge of Liverpool for the first time in a 2–0 win over Newcastle United on 26 February 2025, whilst manager Arne Slot and assistant manager Sipke Hulshoff were suspended.

title: John Heitinga appointed head coach of Ajax
snippet: Ajax has reached an agreement with John Heitinga regarding the coach’s move to Amsterdam. Heitinga is signing a contract with Ajax as head coach until June 30, 2027.

title: Ajax: John Heitinga leaves Liverpool role to rejoin Dutch club as head coach - BBC Sport
snippet: John Heitinga has left his role as Liverpool's assistant boss to return to Dutch club Ajax as their head coach.

title: Official: John Heitinga dismissed as Ajax head coach | Dailysports
snippet: Amsterdam’s Ajax has officially announced the suspension of John Heitinga from his role as head coach.Details: The club’s official statement confirms that the coach’s contract, which was set to run until

title: Liverpool assistant manager John Heitinga appointed Ajax head coach - The Athletic
snippet: Liverpool assistant manager John Heitinga has left the club to become Ajax’s head coach.
